verses.text: And the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* against the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* that \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* thou unto them that \w prophesy|strong="H5030"\w* out of their own \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w*, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*;\f + \fr 13.2 \ft that prophesy out…: Heb. that are prophets out of their own hearts\f*

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; \w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* unto the \w foolish|strong="H5036"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, that \w follow|strong="H1980"\w* their own \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*, and have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* nothing!\f + \fr 13.3 \ft follow: Heb. walk after\f*\f + \fr 13.3 \ft and…: or, and things which they have not seen\f*
O \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, thy \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* are like the \w foxes|strong="H7776"\w* in the \w deserts|strong="H2723"\w*.

Ye have not gone \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into the \w gaps|strong="H6556"\w*, neither made \w up|strong="H1443"\w* the \w hedge|strong="H1447"\w* for the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* in the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 13.5 \ft gaps: or, breaches\f*\f + \fr 13.5 \ft made…: Heb. hedged the hedge\f*

They have \w seen|strong="H2372"\w* \w vanity|strong="H7723"\w* and \w lying|strong="H3577"\w* \w divination|strong="H7081"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w saith|strong="H5002"\w*: and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath not \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* them: and they have made \add others\add* to \w hope|strong="H3176"\w* that they would \w confirm|strong="H6965"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w*.

Have ye not \w seen|strong="H2372"\w* a \w vain|strong="H7723"\w* \w vision|strong="H4236"\w*, and have ye not \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* a \w lying|strong="H3577"\w* \w divination|strong="H4738"\w*, whereas ye \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* \add it;\add* albeit I have not \w spoken|strong="H0559"\w*?

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*; Because ye have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w vanity|strong="H7723"\w*, and \w seen|strong="H2372"\w* \w lies|strong="H3577"\w*, therefore, behold, I \add am\add* against you, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*.

And mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* shall be upon the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* that \w see|strong="H2374"\w* \w vanity|strong="H7723"\w*, and that \w divine|strong="H7080"\w* \w lies|strong="H3577"\w*: they shall not be in the \w assembly|strong="H5475"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, neither shall they be \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w writing|strong="H3791"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, neither shall they \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 13.9 \ft assembly: or, secret, or, counsel\f*

¶ Because, even because they have \w seduced|strong="H2937"\w* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Peace|strong="H7965"\w*; and \add there was\add* no \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*; and one built \w up|strong="H1129"\w* a \w wall|strong="H2434"\w*, and, \w lo|strong="H2009"\w*, others \w daubed|strong="H2902"\w* it with \w untempered|strong="H8602"\w* \add morter:\add*\f + \fr 13.10 \ft a wall: or, a slight wall\f*

\w Say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them which \w daub|strong="H2902"\w* \add it\add* with \w untempered|strong="H8602"\w* \add morter\add*, that it shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*: there shall be an \w overflowing|strong="H7857"\w* \w shower|strong="H1653"\w*; and \w ye|strong="H0859"\w*, O great \w hailstones|strong="H0417"\w*, shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*; and a \w stormy|strong="H5591"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* shall \w rend|strong="H1234"\w* \add it\add*.

Lo, when the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w* is \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w*, shall it not be \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto you, Where \add is\add* the \w daubing|strong="H2915"\w* wherewith ye have \w daubed|strong="H2902"\w* \add it\add*?

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; I will even \w rend|strong="H1234"\w* \add it\add* with a \w stormy|strong="H5591"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* in my \w fury|strong="H2534"\w*; and there shall be an \w overflowing|strong="H7857"\w* \w shower|strong="H1653"\w* in mine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, and great \w hailstones|strong="H0417"\w* in \add my\add* \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* to \w consume|strong="H3617"\w* \add it\add*.

So will I break \w down|strong="H2040"\w* the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w* that ye have \w daubed|strong="H2902"\w* with \w untempered|strong="H8602"\w* \add morter\add*, and \w bring|strong="H5060"\w* it down to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*, so that the \w foundation|strong="H3247"\w* thereof shall be \w discovered|strong="H1540"\w*, and it shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*, and ye shall be \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* thereof: and ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Thus will I \w accomplish|strong="H3615"\w* my \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* upon the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w*, and upon them that have \w daubed|strong="H2902"\w* it with \w untempered|strong="H8602"\w* \add morter\add*, and will \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto you, The \w wall|strong="H7023"\w* \add is\add* no \add more\add*, neither they that \w daubed|strong="H2902"\w* it;

\add To wit\add*, the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* which \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* concerning \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and which \w see|strong="H2374"\w* \w visions|strong="H2377"\w* of \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* for her, and \add there is\add* no \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.

¶ Likewise, thou \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w set|strong="H7760"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* against the \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, which \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* out of their own \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*; and \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* thou against them,

And \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; \w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* to the \add women\add* that \w sew|strong="H8609"\w* \w pillows|strong="H3704"\w* to all \w armholes|strong="H0679"\w*, and \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w kerchiefs|strong="H4555"\w* upon the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of every \w stature|strong="H6967"\w* to \w hunt|strong="H6679"\w* \w souls|strong="H5315"\w*! Will ye \w hunt|strong="H6679"\w* the \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and will ye \w save|strong="H2421"\w* the \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* \w alive|strong="H2421"\w* \add that come\add* unto you?\f + \fr 13.18 \ft armholes: or, elbows\f*

And will ye \w pollute|strong="H2490"\w* me among my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* for \w handfuls|strong="H8168"\w* of \w barley|strong="H8184"\w* and for \w pieces|strong="H6595"\w* of \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, to \w slay|strong="H4191"\w* the \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* that should not \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, and to \w save|strong="H2421"\w* the \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* \w alive|strong="H2421"\w* that should not \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, by your \w lying|strong="H3576"\w* to my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \add your\add* \w lies|strong="H3577"\w*?

Wherefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I \add am\add* against your \w pillows|strong="H3704"\w*, wherewith \w ye|strong="H0859"\w* there \w hunt|strong="H6679"\w* the \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* to make \add them\add* \w fly|strong="H6524"\w*, and I will \w tear|strong="H7167"\w* them from your \w arms|strong="H2220"\w*, and will let the \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, \add even\add* the \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* that ye \w hunt|strong="H6679"\w* to make \add them\add* \w fly|strong="H6524"\w*.\f + \fr 13.20 \ft to make…: or, into gardens\f*

Your \w kerchiefs|strong="H4555"\w* also will I \w tear|strong="H7167"\w*, and \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* out of your \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and they shall be no more in your \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* to be \w hunted|strong="H4686"\w*; and ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Because with \w lies|strong="H8267"\w* ye have made the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w sad|strong="H3512"\w*, whom I have not made \w sad|strong="H3510"\w*; and \w strengthened|strong="H2388"\w* the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w*, that he should not \w return|strong="H7725"\w* from his \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, by promising him \w life|strong="H2421"\w*:\f + \fr 13.22 \ft by…: or, that I should save his life: Heb. by quickening him\f*

Therefore ye shall \w see|strong="H2372"\w* no more \w vanity|strong="H7723"\w*, nor \w divine|strong="H7080"\w* \w divinations|strong="H7081"\w*: for I will \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* out of your \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: and ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
